summary: While the Nazi regime subjugates European Nations, in the Belgian Congo, Doctor Rachel Cade tries to cure those troubled people. Colonel Derode falls in love with her, but a young American injured pilot upsets his plans.
cast: Angie Dickinson|Peter Finch|Roger Moore|Errol John|Woody Strode|Juano Hernandez|Frederick O'Neal|Mary Wickes|Scatman Crothers|Rafer Johnson|Charles Wood|Douglas Spencer|Naaman Brown
